name: LandMine
description:
TriJam 168

How long did it take me - very very long - still wanted to upload it because it is cool

Theme - Do not kill anybody - you your job is not to kill Mr Nobody

Land mines will kill Mr Nobody

User Keyboard:

Up Arrow (W) move forward
Down Arrow (S) move backwards
Left (A) turns 90 camera
Right (D) turns -90 camera

Synty Asests
Miximo - Ybot
Music and one sound is from packs I have
